trans-unit.source: Finally, there is a filter named ‘editor_max_image_size’, that will be called on the calculated array for width and height, respectively.

Finally, there is a filter named ‘editor_max_image_size’, that will be called on the calculated array for width and height, respectively. The second parameter will be the value that was in the $size parameter. The returned type for the hook is an array with the width as the first element and the height as the second element.
trans-unit.target: 最后，有一个名为“ editor_max_image_size”的过滤器，该过滤器将分别在计算出的数组中针对宽度和高度进行调用。第二个参数将是$ size参数中的值。挂钩的返回类型是一个数组，其宽度为第一个元素，高度为第二个元素。

trans-unit.source: First available with WordPress Version 2.8, this template tag returns the description of a given term. A term ID and taxonomy are as parameters. If no term ID is passed, the description of current queried term (e.g. post category or tag) will be returned.
First half of escaping for LIKE special characters % and _ before preparing for MySQL.
